price: Nasi kwa rehema zetu tukampa nduguye, Harun, awe Nabii.
arabic: وَوَهَبۡنَا لَهُۥ مِن رَّحۡمَتِنَآ أَخَاهُ هَٰرُونَ نَبِيّٗا

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wawahabnā lahu min raḥmatinā akhāhu hārūna nabiyyan
